## Path2.(constructor)

Creates a Path2 object from the starting 2D coordinates x and y.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
constructor(x: number, y: number);
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  x | <code>number</code> | the starting points x value |
|  y | <code>number</code> | the starting points y value |
